text.headline: YouTube link JACC: Heart Failure Virtual Journal Club
text.text: In part one of JACC: Heart Failure's first Virtual Journal Club, Drs. Scott Solomon, Jonathan Cunningham, James Januzzi and Nasrien Ibrahim  includes the presentation of two recent manuscripts in the journals focused on natriuretic peptides. Subsequent discussion led by Editor-in-Chief Dr. Christopher O'Connor reveals the inner workings of the Editorial Board assessment and interaction with the senior and junior authors. Learn more on JACC.org: https://bit.ly/2XgBVdk
